WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS 1100Z TO 2100Z
   DAILY 06 THRU 20 NOV BY M/V COMANDO B,
   M/V ZATTO, M/V QING FENG LING, M/V CAP FELIX
   AND M/V AHSOKA IN:
   A. 20-22.23S 040-11.13W.
   B. 20-22.58S 040-08.63W.
   C. 20-22.30S 040-11.40W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 202200Z NOV 22.
